Image Loading¶

class ih.workflow.ImageLoader(template, output, validOnly=False, overwrite=False)[source]¶

This should handle all meta-data definitions

crawl()[source]¶

Recursively walks through directories in base, and loads the appropriate data.

write()[source]¶

Writes the data loaded from crawl into csv format based on ‘order’
